tags.name: fill-in-the-blanks
tags.description:
`fill-in-the-blanks`
`Fill in the blanks question`

Events:

  * `simple-toast-hide` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

  * `simple-toast-show` {`CustomEvent<{ hat: string; fire: boolean; text: string; accentColor: string; duration: number; slot: HTMLElement; }>`} - 

  * `user-engagement` {`CustomEvent<{ activityDisplay: string; objectName: string; resultSuccess: boolean; }>`} - 

  * `playaudio` {`CustomEvent<{ sound: any; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `missedAnswers` {`any[]`} - 

  * `wordList` {`any[]`} - 

  * `statement` {`string`} - 

  * `numberCorrect` {`number`} - 

  * `numberGuessed` {`number`} - 

  * `hasHint` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasContent` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasFeedbackIncorrect` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasFeedbackCorrect` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasEvidence` {`boolean`} - 

  * `related-resource` {`string`} - Related Resource ID

  * `max-attempts` {`number`} - 

  * `attempts` {`number`} - 

  * `show-answer` {`boolean`} - 

  * `randomize` {`boolean`} - Randomize the display of the answers

  * `hide-buttons` {`boolean`} - flag to hide buttons

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Support disabling interaction with the entire board

  * `single-option` {`boolean`} - Simple option, otherwise allow multiple via checkbox

  * `media` {`string`} - 

  * `question` {`string`} - Question to ask

  * `answers` {`any[]`} - Array of possible answers

  * `displayedAnswers` {`never[]`} - Displayed Answer set.

  * `correct-text` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

  * `incorrect-text` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

  * `quiz-name` {`string`} - Name of the quiz - hardcoded for now from HTML

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

  * `t` - 

Properties:

  * `missedAnswers` {`any[]`} - 

  * `wordList` {`any[]`} - 

  * `statement` {`string`} - 

  * `numberCorrect` {`number`} - 

  * `numberGuessed` {`number`} - 

  * `hasHint` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasContent` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasFeedbackIncorrect` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasFeedbackCorrect` {`boolean`} - 

  * `hasEvidence` {`boolean`} - 

  * `relatedResource` {`string`} - Related Resource ID

  * `guessDataValue` {`string`} - 

  * `shadowRootOptions` - 

  * `maxAttempts` {`number`} - 

  * `attempts` {`number`} - 

  * `showAnswer` {`boolean`} - 

  * `randomize` {`boolean`} - Randomize the display of the answers

  * `hideButtons` {`boolean`} - flag to hide buttons

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Support disabling interaction with the entire board

  * `singleOption` {`boolean`} - Simple option, otherwise allow multiple via checkbox

  * `media` {`string`} - 

  * `question` {`string`} - Question to ask

  * `answers` {`any[]`} - Array of possible answers

  * `displayedAnswers` {`never[]`} - Displayed Answer set.

  * `correctText` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

  * `incorrectText` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

  * `incorrectIcon` {`string`} - 

  * `quizName` {`string`} - Name of the quiz - hardcoded for now from HTML

  * `schemaResourceID` {`string`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

  * `t` -

attributes.name: randomize
attributes.description:
`randomize` {`boolean`} - Randomize the display of the answers

Property: randomize

Default: false

attributes.name: hide-buttons
attributes.description:
`hide-buttons` {`boolean`} - flag to hide buttons

Property: hideButtons

Default: false

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
`disabled` {`boolean`} - Support disabling interaction with the entire board

Property: disabled

Default: false

attributes.name: single-option
attributes.description:
`single-option` {`boolean`} - Simple option, otherwise allow multiple via checkbox

Property: singleOption

Default: false

attributes.name: question
attributes.description:
`question` {`string`} - Question to ask

Property: question

Default: Fill in the blanks

attributes.name: answers
attributes.description:
`answers` {`any[]`} - Array of possible answers

Property: answers

Default:

attributes.name: displayedAnswers
attributes.description:
`displayedAnswers` {`never[]`} - Displayed Answer set.

Property: displayedAnswers

Default:

attributes.name: correct-text
attributes.description:
`correct-text` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

Property: correctText

Default: Great job!

attributes.name: incorrect-text
attributes.description:
`incorrect-text` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

Property: incorrectText

Default: Better luck next time!

attributes.name: quiz-name
attributes.description:
`quiz-name` {`string`} - Name of the quiz - hardcoded for now from HTML

Property: quizName

Default: default

attributes.name: schemaMap
attributes.description:
`schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

Property: schemaMap

Default: [object Object]
